Why Study Business with MCKL?

Industrial Revolution 4.0 (IR 4.0) is upon us and has impacted societies, business models, future jobs and careers. As more emphasis is placed on smart solutions, automation, data analytics and internet of things (IoT) technology in businesses, the demand for digitally-skilled talents are also widely growing.

To meet the demands of IR 4.0, MCKL recognises the need to equip our students with future-oriented skills. Our new diploma programmes are here to prepare our students to be job-ready!

Gain Future-ready Skills & Knowledge

Exposure to industry-relevant skills such as Search Engine Optimisation (SEO), Social Media Content Marketing, International Business, Cybersecurity and Blockchain.

Progress into an International Degree

Opportunity to pursue a bachelor's degree at our partner universities abroad, such as Sheffield Hallam University, Deakin University and Keele University.

Be Job-Ready with Industrial Training

12-week industrial training in the final semester with industry experts provides real-life working experience and a seamless transition to employment.

Programmes Offered

Intake: 15 June & 24 August 2023

Diploma in Digital Marketing

KL: KPT/JPS(N/342/4/0233)(MQA/PA14523)05/28
PG: KPT/JPS(N/342/4/0236)(MQA/PA15219)05/27

What is Digital Marketing?

Have you ever wondered what goes on behind the scenes of every Chinese New Year video or Hari Raya contest that you see online? Digital marketing is the combination of various marketing effort that takes place online in one form or another. By leveraging various digital channels such as search engines, email, social media, websites, and mobile apps, brands are able to reach out to their target audience much more easily, efficiently as well as precisely than ever before. From creating brand awareness to driving sales, digital marketing is now where traditional advertising used to be.

Enquire Now

Digital marketing has evolved over the years making it one of the most sought-after forms of advertising in today's fast-changing world. The programme is designed to equip students with in-demand digital skills such as search engine optimisation (SEO), search engine marketing (SEM), social media marketing, electronic direct mail (EDM) marketing and other digital platforms. The programme also develops skills that are needed to analyse market needs and trends, define target markets and unlock business opportunities in a competitive environment.

Students are now job-ready to explore careers such as:

  • Content Creator Digital Marketing
  • Digital Marketing Executive
  • E-Service Executive
  • Market Research Analyst
  • Media Content Strategist
  • Online Business Entrepreneur
  • Social Media Executive

Students can also top up 2 years to progress into a bachelor’s degree programme at our partner universities:

Deakin University, Australia

Commerce | Business Analytics

Keele University, UK

International Business Management | Marketing and Business Management

Sheffield Hallam University, UK

Digital Marketing | Business and Digital Technology | Information Technology with Business Studies

Diploma in Digital Business

KL: KPT/JPS(N/340/4/0800)(MQA/PA14316)04/28
PG: KPT/JPS(N/340/4/0806)(MQA/PA15220)05/27

What is Digital Business?

Have you ever wondered how to start your own online business or how international brands have embraced Digital Business as part of their retail strategy? Digital Business is a sales channel that enables entrepreneurs and businesses to sell online, directly to consumers, but that’s not all. It is also about marketing, gaining consumer trust and confidence and so much more; without physically interacting with customers both locally and beyond geographical borders.

Enquire Now

Digital Business has great future prospects as most businesses are moving online for greater penetration into the market through faster and wider reach via the usage of the Internet. The programme will provide students with an in-depth understanding of the context, nature, role and significance of e-business / Digital Business activities in a dynamic business world. Students will gain exposure to theoretical and practical knowledge of conducting an online business over the Web and also the fundamentals of entrepreneurship for the opportunity to start their own businesses.

Students are now job-ready to explore careers such as:

  • Digital Marketing Executive
  • Digital Business Entrepreneur
  • Digital Business Executive
  • Digital Business Planner
  • Market Research Analyst
  • Online Business Analyst
  • Web Development Specialist

Students can also top up 1-2 years to progress into a bachelor’s degree programme at our partner universities:

Deakin University, Australia

Commerce | Business

Keele University, UK

International Business Management | Marketing and Business Management

Middlesex University London, UK

International Business Administration

Sheffield Hallam University, UK

Business and Finance | Business Management | Business and Digital Technology | Information Technology with Business Studies

Diploma in Financial Technology

KL: KPT/JPS(N/343/4/0289)(MQA/PA15228)02/29

*Programmes offered in Kuala Lumpur Campus only

What is Financial Technology (FinTech)?

Imagine 10 years ago, would you have ever guessed that we are en route to becoming a cashless society or that financial instruments no longer require banks or face to face interactions to take place? This is FinTech. FinTech, or financial technology, is used to describe businesses that use technological innovation to enhance or automate their financial services and products. This allows for quicker processes, personalised services, and more accurate data. Technology in finance continues to evolve due to advances in big data, artificial intelligence (AI), machine learning and data science. FinTech is now being used in various areas of finance such as mobile banking, cryptocurrency, blockchain, investment and trading.

Enquire Now

FinTech is a rapidly growing industry and will continue to expand for years to come. Talents with cross-discipline knowledge and skills in Finance and Information Technology are in demand for the coming years. The programme will fully equip students with comprehensive knowledge and future-oriented skills in Financial Technology. Some of the key areas include Financial Accounting, Financial Management, Principles of Investment and Blockchain. With a comprehensive programme, MCKL aims to produce future-ready students to meet the need of the FinTech industry.

Students are now job-ready to explore careers such as:

  • App Developer
  • Blockchain Developer
  • Cybersecurity Analyst
  • Data Scientist
  • Financial Analyst
  • FinTech Quantitative Developer
  • FinTech Systems Analyst
  • Investment Analyst

Students can also choose to progress into a bachelor’s degree programme at our partner universities.

Our Industry Partners

MCKL has partnered with multiple industry-leading experts to ensure students are able to obtain industrial training as part of their programme of study. Through our flagship Industrial Collaboration Programme (ICP), students are given the opportunity to take on real-world projects which enable them to gain valuable insights and working experience in the digital business, marketing and financial technology industry. Students will also obtain digital literacy, specialised knowledge and work skills to be future-ready for Industrial Revolution 4.0.

About MCKL

Welcome to Methodist College Kuala Lumpur
An Institution where values and tradition meet excellence in education!

For over four decades, Methodist College Kuala Lumpur (MCKL) has been providing quality, holistic education in the best of Methodist tradition. MCKL fully embraces the challenges and opportunities of educating and preparing students for further education, professional development, and job careers in the new IR 4.0 environment.

Globally Recognised

Providing renowned professional pre-university and tertiary programmes.

Industry Revolution 4.0

Operations & learning system in line with the IR 4.0 environment.

Microsoft Recognition

Providing flexibility with 100% blended learning via Microsoft cloud learning system.

MCKL DNA

Nurturing students with Character Formation and Service Learning programmes throughout their studies.
